doctor.title: Meet Dr. Lena Zembel
doctor.intro: The specialist who brings together the best of two worlds - German precision and technology, with Israeli warmth and personal care
doctor.quote: "My dream has always been to combine the highest medical excellence with human and warm treatment. Every patient who comes to me receives not only advanced medical care, but also understanding, patience, and genuine concern for their wellbeing. This is not just work for me - it's a mission."
